projects.title: User Churn Rate for a Phone Company
projects.description: Analyzed customer churn rates to identify key factors contributing to contract cancellation and developed unbalanced classification models to predict the likelihood of individual customer churn.

projects.title: Predictive Maintenance Model
projects.description: Built a model to predict equipment failure based on sensor data, helping to schedule maintenance proactively and reduce downtime.

projects.title: Automated Pay Statement Generator
projects.description: Engineered a complete Python Django web application that automated pay statement generation, resulting in a significant reduction of hundreds of annual man-hours.

projects.title: WordPress Site Migration to Docker
projects.description: Ensured seamless WordPress site migrations to Docker containers by effectively troubleshooting and resolving 100% of unexpected issues, improving deployment and scalability.

projects.title: Database Management Scripts
projects.description: Streamlined database management by developing Python (Pandas) automation scripts, saving substantial man-hours and enriching the company's service offerings.
